channel.title: T2 error while connecting with other client :( help please
channel.description:
hi. i just started a server, with it's own client, but when i try to log into the server from other client (+ moparscape client) i get this error: [b]Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 12,0,0 - 80,111,105,110,116,115,58,32,48,10,76,-59,[/b]
i know it means that it's only allowed to join from the server's own client... but how to fix it? :confused: :confused: :confused:
Greets, snackman

item.title: T2 error while connecting with other client :( help please
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

hi. i just started a server, with it’s own client, but when i try to log into the server from other client (+ moparscape client)
i get this error:
Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 12,0,0 - 80,111,105,110,116,115,58,32,48,10,76,-59,

i know it means that it’s only allowed to join from the server’s own client… but how to fix it?

Greets,
